column1: Little Goat Diner////Homemade everything.  Bread with bacon baked into it.  Wow
column3: wow!  We had a veggie quesadilla and a grilled cheese that was one of the most hearty sandwiches I've ever eaten.  Rebecca was our very kind
column6: and professional server.  I could eat here all day every day.....and weigh 500 pounds
column7: but it might jus be worth it!
